definition: nest/pit or hollow on the human body/lair/den/place/to harbor or shelter/to hold in check/to bend/classifier for litters and broods
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: I afforded your trip but you rendered my son so much trouble.
sentences.chinese: 我出錢，還讓我兒子受了這麼多的窩囊氣。

sentences.english: "I'm goin' to quit, " he announced. "I won't stand for it.
sentences.chinese: “我不幹了，”他宣佈，“受不了這種窩囊氣。
